titles.title: A bill to suspend tempoarily the duty on 4-vinylbenzenesulfonic acid, lithium salt.
A bill to suspend tempoarily the duty on 4-vinylbenzenesulfonic acid, lithium salt.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily suspend the duty on 4-vinylbenzenesulfonic acid, lithium salt.
